price: 64. ceux-là recevront l’heureuse nouvelle en ce bas monde et dans l’autre. Nul changement aux paroles d’Allah, voilà le succès suprême !
arabic: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lahumu al-bush'rā fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati lā tabdīla likalimāti al-lahi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
